meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Blood</kanji> flows through your <kanji>vein</kanji>s, carrying the stories of your <vocabulary>lineage</vocabulary>, your <vocabulary>bloodline</vocabulary>.

Note that this word is quite formal and literary.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
